summary: Gold Armory Adds Craftable Gold Armor And Weapons Variants To The Game.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/38502075-1512646313.png[/img]

[b][left]Gold Armory Adds Craftable Gold Armor And Weapons Variants To The Game. 
Contains Both Male And Female Versions. 
Armor Can Be Crafted At Any Forge Under The Misc Catagory.
----------------
Permissions.
----------------
Feel Free To Use This Mod As A Resource As Long As Credit Is Given To Me.[/left][/b]
